channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Robotic Process Automation
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Robotic Process Automation

item.title: CVE-2022-30616|2024-08-03T06:56:12.959Z -- ibm -- robotic%20process%20automation
item.description: IBM Robotic Process Automation 21.0.0, 21.0.1, and 21.0.2 could allow a privileged user to elevate their privilege to platform administrator through manipulation of APIs. IBM X-Force ID: 227978.

item.title: CVE-2022-33169|2024-08-03T08:01:20.179Z -- ibm -- robotic%20process%20automation
item.description: IBM Robotic Process Automation 21.0.0, 21.0.1, and 21.0.2 is vulnerable to insufficiently protected credentials for users created via a bulk upload. IBM X-Force ID: 228888.

item.title: CVE-2022-46773|2024-08-03T14:39:38.664Z -- ibm -- robotic%20process%20automation
item.description: IBM Robotic Process Automation 21.0.0 - 21.0.7 and 23.0.0 is vulnerable to client-side validation bypass for credential pools. Invalid credential pools may be created as a result. IBM X-Force ID: 242951.

item.title: CVE-2022-38710|2024-08-03T11:02:14.414Z -- ibm -- robotic%20process%20automation
item.description: IBM Robotic Process Automation 21.0.1 and 21.0.2 could disclose sensitive version information that could aid in further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 234292.

item.title: CVE-2022-22334|2024-08-03T03:07:50.431Z -- ibm -- robotic%20process%20automation
item.description: IBM Robotic Process Automation 21.0.0, 21.0.1, and 21.0.2 could allow a user to access information from a tenant of which they should not have access. IBM X-Force ID: 219391.

item.title: CVE-2022-34338|2024-08-03T09:07:16.144Z -- ibm -- robotic%20process%20automation
item.description: IBM Robotic Process Automation 21.0.0, 21.0.1, and 21.0.2 could disclose sensitive information due to improper privilege management for storage provider types. IBM X-Force ID: 229962.

item.title: CVE-2022-22412|2024-08-03T03:14:55.126Z -- ibm -- robotic%20process%20automation
item.description: IBM Robotic Process Automation 21.0.0, 21.0.1, and 21.0.2 could allow a user with access to the local host (client machine) to obtain a login access token. IBM X-Force ID: 223019.

item.title: CVE-2022-22413|2024-08-03T03:14:54.986Z -- ibm -- robotic%20process%20automation
item.description: IBM Robotic Process Automation 21.0.0, 21.0.1, and 21.0.2 is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially crafted SQL statements, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database. IBM X-Force ID: 223022.

item.title: CVE-2022-22434|2024-08-03T03:14:55.178Z -- ibm -- robotic%20process%20automation
item.description: IBM Robotic Process Automation 21.0.0, 21.0.1, and 21.0.2 could allow a user with physical access to create an API request modified to create additional objects. IBM X-Force ID: 224159.

item.title: CVE-2022-22490|2024-08-03T03:14:55.341Z -- ibm -- robotic%20process%20automation
item.description: IBM Robotic Process Automation 21.0.0, 21.0.1, and 21.0.2 could allow a privileged user to obtain sensitive Azure bot credential information. IBM X-Force ID: 226342.

item.title: CVE-2022-22505|2024-08-03T03:14:55.317Z -- ibm -- robotic%20process%20automation
item.description: IBM Robotic Process Automation 21.0.0, 21.0.1, and 21.0.2 contains a vulnerability that could allow IBM tenant credentials to be exposed. IBM X-Force ID: 227288.

item.title: CVE-2022-22414|2024-08-03T03:14:55.099Z -- ibm -- robotic%20process%20automation
item.description: IBM Robotic Process Automation 21.0.2 could allow a local user to obtain sensitive web service configuration credentials from system memory. IBM X-Force ID: 223026.

item.title: CVE-2022-41294|2024-08-03T12:42:44.687Z -- ibm -- robotic%20process%20automation
item.description: IBM Robotic Process Automation 21.0.0, 21.0.1, 21.0.2, 21.0.3, and 21.0.4 is vulnerable to cross origin resource sharing using the bot api. IBM X-Force ID: 236807.

item.title: CVE-2022-39168|2024-08-03T11:10:32.575Z -- ibm -- robotic%20process%20automation
item.description: IBM Robotic Process Automation Clients are vulnerable to proxy credentials being exposed in upgrade logs. IBM X-Force ID: 235422.

item.title: CVE-2022-22503|2024-08-03T03:14:55.335Z -- ibm -- robotic%20process%20automation
item.description: IBM Robotic Process Automation 21.0.0 could allow a remote attacker to hijack the clicking action of the victim. By persuading a victim to visit a malicious Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to hijack the victim's click actions and possibly launch further attacks against the victim. IBM X-Force ID: 227125.

item.title: CVE-2022-43573|2024-08-03T13:32:59.640Z -- ibm -- robotic%20process%20automation
item.description: IBM Robotic Process Automation 20.12 through 21.0.6 is vulnerable to exposure of the name and email for the creator/modifier of platform level objects. IBM X-Force ID: 238678.

item.title: CVE-2022-36774|2024-08-03T10:14:28.143Z -- ibm -- robotic%20process%20automation
item.description: IBM Robotic Process Automation 21.0.0, 21.0.1, and 21.0.2 is vulnerable to man in the middle attacks through manipulation of the client proxy configuration. IBM X-Force ID: 233575.

item.title: CVE-2022-35280|2024-08-03T09:36:43.382Z -- ibm -- robotic%20process%20automation
item.description: IBM Robotic Process Automation 21.0.0, 21.0.1, and 21.0.2 does not require that users should have strong passwords by default, which makes it easier for attackers to compromise user accounts. IBM X-Force ID: 230634.

item.title: CVE-2022-41740|2024-08-03T12:49:43.782Z -- ibm -- robotic%20process%20automation
item.description: IBM Robotic Process Automation 20.12 through 21.0.6 could allow an attacker with physical access to the system to obtain highly sensitive information from system memory. IBM X-Force ID: 238053.

item.title: CVE-2022-22433|2024-08-03T03:14:55.084Z -- ibm -- robotic%20process%20automation
item.description: IBM Robotic Process Automation 21.0.1 and 21.0.2 is vulnerable to External Service Interaction attack, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to induce the application to perform server-side DNS lookups or HTTP requests to arbitrary domain names. By submitting suitable payloads, an attacker can cause the application server to attack other systems that it can interact with. IBM X-Force ID: 224156.

item.title: CVE-2022-22415|2024-08-03T03:14:54.957Z -- ibm -- robotic%20process%20automation
item.description: A vulnerability exists where an IBM Robotic Process Automation 21.0.1 regular user is able to obtain view-only access to some admin pages in the Control Center IBM X-Force ID: 223029.

item.title: CVE-2022-30607|2024-08-03T06:56:13.182Z -- ibm -- robotic%20process%20automation
item.description: IBM Robotic Process Automation 20.10.0, 20.12.5, 21.0.0, 21.0.1, and 21.0.2 contains a vulnerability that could allow a user to obtain sensitive information due to information properly masked in the control center UI. IBM X-Force ID: 227294.

item.title: CVE-2022-22502|2024-08-03T03:14:55.352Z -- ibm -- robotic%20process%20automation
item.description: IBM Robotic Process Automation 21.0.1 and 21.0.2 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 227124.

item.title: CVE-2022-38709|2024-08-03T11:02:14.505Z -- ibm -- robotic%20process%20automation
item.description: IBM Robotic Process Automation 21.0.1, 21.0.2, and 21.0.3 for Cloud Pak is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 234291.

item.title: CVE-2022-33953|2024-08-03T08:16:16.121Z -- ibm -- robotic%20process%20automation
item.description: IBM Robotic Process Automation 21.0.1 and 21.0.2 could allow a user with psychical access to the system to obtain sensitive information due to insufficiently protected access tokens. IBM X-Force ID: 229198.

item.title: CVE-2022-22506|2024-07-05T17:20:52.644Z -- ibm -- robotic%20process%20automation
item.description: IBM Robotic Process Automation 21.0.2 contains a vulnerability that could allow user ids may be exposed across tenants. IBM X-Force ID: 227293.

item.title: CVE-2022-22506|2024-08-03T03:14:55.304Z -- ibm -- robotic%20process%20automation
item.description: IBM Robotic Process Automation 21.0.2 contains a vulnerability that could allow user ids may be exposed across tenants. IBM X-Force ID: 227293.
